name: Nutralyn
indications: nutralyn prescription multivitamin/multi-mineral dietary supplement formulated dietary management subuoptimal nutritional status patients advanced folate , vitamin b supplementa­tion , maintenance good health needed .
warningsAndPrecautions: bottles 30 tablets ( 85477-903-30 ) . tablet light blue , oblong .
adverseReactions: nutralyn contraindicated patients known hypersensitivity ingredients .
indications_original: Nutralyn is a prescription multivitamin/multi-mineral dietary supplement formulated for the clinical dietary management of a subuoptimal nutritional status in patients where advanced folate, vitamin B supplementa­tion, and maintenance of good health is needed.
contraindications_original: One tablet daily or as directed by a physician.
warningsAndPrecautions_original: Bottles of 30 Tablets (85477-903-30). Tablet is light blue, oblong.
adverseReactions_original: Nutralyn is contraindicated in patients with a known hypersensitivity to any of the ingredients.
